ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are very much indebted to Dr. Jyoti Joshi Bhatta (Department of Plant Resources), Keshab Ranabhat, Kamal Prasad Regmi, and Lila Bahadur Magar for arranging the sample collection, voucher specimen, and shipment of plants to Belgium. The authors are also thankful to Purity Ngina Kipanga (KU Leuven) for technical help in the laboratory and Yipeng Ma (KU Leuven) for help with the antiviral section and some suggestions while preparing the manuscript. SKP is grateful for receipt of a postdoc fellowship from EMINTE (Erasmus Mundus, EU; http://eminte.eu/). BJ and WL largely supported themselves.
